header.title: Step 3: Retrieve and add EMF Objects

body.p: In this step the library is retrieved from the backend and a few checks are done on the retrieved EMF objects. In addition a new book and writer are added to the library.

section.title: Retrieve Library EMF Object
section.p: In this part of the tutorial the library object is retrieved.

section.title: Do some checks
section.p: The library object has been retrieved now a few checks are done to ensure that the correct information was retrieved.

section.title: Add a new book and writer
section.p: Here a new book and writer are added to the library.
